post.body: Did it sorta tell u "watch me if u can"?
Did u forget to turn it on and ran straight into the part where all the meters are?
This doesn't apply to Ghajini right? I mean it says "Remember". (Note to self: Enough of ur stupid Ghajini Jokes)
I didn't watch Ghajini. I wrote a review anyway and I forgot that I will get search hits with it :)
I think the cows are wearing invisibility cloak. I still see dungs in the street sometimes.
Hey, yes I am getting ur tweet. I had to bolt out the other day. Spending some vacation time in India.
May be he forgot to stop exercising at the right time :)
I had to wake up at 4AM once for a marriage and I couldn't be late because it was mine :)
What Santa? Did you say @lavsmohan is operating her helicopter with her ability to put mokkai blades? I am defeated.
Dear Santa, Thanks for sending me the fan blades of every helicopter in the world. Muhahahaha :)
I know why, look at your profile pic, your left hand is scratching the head. So ur right hand alone types!
May be you have to watch it twice since it is part 2
feel like singing a telugu song - Luxu pappa Luxu pappa, Lunchukostava laddu korikistava love thinipistava lily poovante neevu leesu kistava
A Memorable review of Ghajini - http://tinyurl.com/8p5xrv Don't forget to read it!
Madurai has developed a lot. I couldn't spot a Cow on the road for the first 3 days!!
If Ghajini becomes a flop, the only reason will be that people forgot to watch it.
And for the past few days I have been lacking the wit to twit. Shall we say Wit Lag or perhaps Twit Lag
One important side effect of Jet lag that is often overlooked is Shit Lag
Q: What do u do when you have ur left hand very close to your left ear, when waiting at airport? A: Place a cellphone in between.
After 2 days of no update, all I can say is $7 for 0.75 Litres of water is not just Pagal Kollai, big time Transit Kollai
